ResearchDataEntry.Name: Données Boîte Noire
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Votre combinaison contient une boîte noir qui a stocké toutes les informations des capteurs pendant la chute sur cette planète. La recherche sur ces données pourrait vous aider à comprendre ce qui a pu exactement se passer.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Une analyse approfondie des données de la boîte noire enregistrée par votre combinaison est maintenant terminée. Il confirme votre analyse visuelle selon laquelle un objet étranger, considéré comme un météore, a frappé la station alors que vous prépariez à apponter. L'explosion qui en a résulté a endommagé les propulseurs de manœuvre de votre vaisseau provoquant un atterrissage sur cette plante étrangère. Aucun autre survivant n'a été détecté actuellement.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Amélioration de Combinaison
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Votre combinaison environnementale est la pièce d’ingénierie d’exploration la plus avancée connue de l’homme. Malheureusement, son utilité dépend d'un système d'amélioration modulaire qui dépasse actuellement nos capacités de fabrication. Il est temps de voir comment vous pouvez créer vos propres améliorations hors des usines de votre base. Vous pouvez utiliser un peu l'aide pour survivre dans cet environnement hostile.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Avec quelques ajustements mineurs, il devrait être possible de produire des mises à niveau de la conception des machines de base, miniaturisées pour être portables. Les améliorations les plus évidentes sont; une meilleure cellule solaire et une isolation au froid pour fonctionner à plus haut rendement sur cette planète hostile. Vous devrez utiliser une amélioration Coupeur Hydrojet sur votre usine de fabrication pour y arriver !

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Formes de Vie Locale
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Cette planète n'est pas morte ! Les scanners détectent des formes de vie végétale et animale. Ce projet étudiera les formes de vie et déterminera si elles représentent une menace.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Les scanners détectent un certain nombre de formes de vie proches qui présentent un risque potentiel. Le design pour un Scanner de Menaces est disponible pour surveiller leurs progrès. Nous devrions également enquêter sur la mise en place de certaines défenses de base. Potentiellement plus préoccupant, nous avons détecté un certain nombre de grandes structures organiques souterraines qui pourraient interférer avec nos efforts pour sécuriser un approvisionnement fiable en ressources.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Ostéologie anthropologique
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Avec toutes ces parties animales parfaitement conservées que nous trouvons, peut-être qu'on pourrait en faire usage? Oui, c'est un vrai mot. Allez le chercher!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Nous avons trouvé un certain nombre d'utilisations pour ceux-ci! Couvrons leurs cadavres partout dans notre base!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Traitement de la résine
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Nous devons analyser de grandes quantités de résine afin de faire face à la menace de Hivemind.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Nous devrions maintenant pouvoir traiter la résine durcie qui envahit le monde. Il semble que les vibrations de nos opérations minières réveillent et attirent ces monstres.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Traitement avancé de la résine
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Nos méthodes actuelles d'extraction de résine raffinée ne suffisent pas.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Nous pouvons maintenant attaquer les excroissances géantes extraterrestres avec un bâton. Métaphoriquement parlant.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Laboratories
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Nos recherches sont limitées par les contraintes de la station de recherche. Nous avons besoin de concevoir un nouveau laboratoire pour faire des recherches plus avancées !
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Nous avons maintenant la conception d'un laboratoire de recherche et les machines d'assemblage nécessaires pour l'alimenter en capsules d'expérimentation. Voir l'entrée du manuel correspondant pour plus d'informations.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Défense de la Base
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Nous ne sommes pas seuls. Nous devrons gagner notre liberté sur cette planète!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Nous pouvons maintenant fabriquer des machines pour apporter la liberté à la vie sur cette planète!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: SpiderBot
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Notre robot de combat modulaire Spider peut être utilisé pour de nombreuses tâches, mais nous allons avoir besoin d'un accueil et d'une station d'amélioration.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Nous pouvons maintenant faire des améliorations d'arme de SpiderBot! Pour charger SpiderBot, nous devons lui construire une base, puis utiliser les chargeurs de bobines de lithium et alimenter des bobines de lithium, afin d'alimenter SpiderBot via des trémies de stockage attachées.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: SpiderBot Defenses Basiques
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Le seul moyen de se défendre consiste à utiliser les défenses mobiles! Cette recherche nous permettra d’ajuster des armes au robot de combat SpiderBot, ce qui signifie à la fois une défense de base solide et une réserve infinie de pièces organiques utiles.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Nous pouvons maintenant faire la première améliorations d'armes de SpiderBot!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: SpiderBot Logistic Basique
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Bien. Cet approvisionnement sans fin de pièces utiles est juste sur le sol. Nous pouvons cependant adapter les FALCOR pour les collecter.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Insérez une balise FALCOR dans la base SpiderBot et nous l’adapterons. Ensuite, SpiderCORS spécialement modifié peut collecter des éléments dans l'environnement.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: SpiderBot Defenses Intérmediaire
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Nous aurons besoin d'une puissance de feu beaucoup plus lourde pour éliminer les mobs les plus imposants.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: La mise à niveau du Cannon est maintenant disponible!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Défenses SpiderBot Avancées
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Même les canons sont peu utiles contre le plus grand des ennemis. Nous aurons besoin d'une meilleure puissance de feu.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: La mise à niveau du fusil à impulsion est maintenant disponible!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Recherche sur le froid
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: La caverne récemment découverte semble être remplie de méthane. Nous allons devoir rechercher des formes spéciales de chauffage afin de progresser plus profondément.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Nous avons maintenant accès à la technologie de chauffage de costume. Fabriquer cela nous permettra de progresser plus profondément dans la planète.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Cryogenics Research
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We'll need to make better use of these ruined animal parts - they're rotting too quickly to use.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We now have access to Cryogenic technology, which will let us store animal parts!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Improved Ore Scanning
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Using local materials, it should be possible to create single use items that improve your suit's built-in ore scanning capabilities
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We have successfully upgraded the ore scanner to support filtering. To do this create a blank ore ping at the manufacturing plant then convert it into the required ore ping filter using your suit's self crafting capability (C). See the handbook for more information.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Basic Mining Upgrades I
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We need to improve the rate at which we can collect and smelt ore. This project will focus on improving the performance of ore exractors and smelters.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We have successfully researched a number of upgrades to improve our resource collection capability including faster drill motors, ore smelter upgrades and a new basic ore smelter.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Power Grid
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We cannot survive on just the power produced by our Central Power Hub for long. As our base expands we'll need to find new ways to generate power and transfer it to distant mining operations so that we don't need to run about powering them manually.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We now have a new method of generating and transporting power. This project has also designed new upgrades for ARTHER and a new machine, the Matter Mover, capable of teleporting materials from one storage hopper to another.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Upgraded Power Grid
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Our power infrastructure is coming along nicely. Our battery technology is quite limited though, this project will attempt to design a better battery which can store more power providing us a bigger buffer.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We have developed a new battery capable of carrying a much bigger charge. We also have designs for a more powerful Laser Energy Transmitter, however this requires materials with more advanced properties than those found near the surface.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Advanced Power Grid
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: The advanced materials we have recently discovered should allow us to make further improvements to our power infrastructure.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We have made further improvements to our power infrastructure including a new Power Storage Block and Laser Energy Transmitter. We also have some provisional designs for a new type of Power Generator, however to complete this research we will also need to find a denser source of energy than the coal we have been relying on so far.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Ultra-Power Grid
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We have reached the limits of power we can store in a single 1m cube. This project will investigate the feasibility of bigger power storage devices.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We have finished designs for a massive battery capable of storing a vast amount of power.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Ultimate Power Grid
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Following on from our success with the MK4 power storage system we should be able to design the ultimate power storage device!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Success! The biggest power storage device we could ever need is now within our manufacturing capabilities. I can see no reason at all why I will ever regret saying that.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Geothermal Power
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Running the larger Drilling machines requires us to also move to a new type of power generation.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Success! The biggest power generation device we could ever need is now within our manufacturing capabilities. There is no reason I can think of that I would ever regret making such a statement!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Basic Miner Upgrades II
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Following on from our previous research on mining upgrades we should be able to further improve our drill motor and forced induction upgrades.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Further improvements for our ore extractors and smelters are now available.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Intermediate Miner Upgrades I
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: It is time to begin research on how to replicate the advanced capabilities of the Ore Smelter supplied with our Central Power Hub. The basic smelters we have been able to construct are too slow and are wasting precious resources.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We have successfully designed a new Ore Smelter. This will require some advanced materials not found near the surface.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Intermediate Miner Upgrades II
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: It should be possible to further enhance the capabilities of the ore extractor. This project will also investigate alternative methods of collecting ore.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Further upgrades to the ore extractor are now available. We have also researched a new Geological Surveyor which can be used to identify locations rich in ore deposits. We should identify some prime locations while we continue research on a new Quarry system.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Advanced Miner Upgrades
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This project will investigate further improvements to the ore extractor and smelter. In addition research will continue work on the new Quarry system.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Further improvements to the ore extractor and smelter are now available. In addition we have finally perfected the Quarry system. Use the Geological Surveyor to identify a prime location then place the quarry to begin mining operations.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Bulk Miner Upgrades
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This will give us access to the fastest Mining upgrades possible without new elements.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We now have access to the MK5 Induction, the ARC Smelter and the AntiMatter DrillMotor.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Base Building
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: It looks like we're stuck here. We're going to need to build a base.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Bases are split into 3 major parts; collection, storage, and processing. Get to it!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Assembly Line Machines
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Bars are simply no use. For us to have any chance of surviving, we will need to craft those into much more complex shapes and types.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now create machines to turn raw Bars into useful primary crafting ingredients. Go try it out!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Automation
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Building a huge mining operation is a job for machines, not man. This wide-ranging project will design machines for automated excavation and construction in addition to improving the options available for traversing your base. This research should be a high priority for the essential automation of our base; doing this all by hand is simply never going to work!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We now have a wider variety of new machines available for automating our base.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Basic Logistics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Optimising your mining operation requires a scalpel, not a hammer. (Hammers available as a seperate upgrade, of course). This research project will focus on improvements in storage, sorting and additional base construction tools. This will also provide us with access to the first tier of moving mass amounts of ore vertically.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Now available : Advanced Conveyor machines, FALCOR automated loot collection system, Dual Matter Movers and Cargo Lifts.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Advanced Logistics and Storage
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: More storage is likely to prove useful in our quest to conquer this planet. Those Robotic Sorters also need an upgrade!.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Now available : Entry-level Mass Storage, Intermediate Robotic Sorter.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Advanced Storage
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This research will allow us to insert and remove many more items into Mass Storage setups.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Now available : Larger Mass-Storage inserters and Upgraded Robotic Sorters.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Bulk Storage
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This research will allow us to insert and remove even more items into Mass Storage setups, including better Robotic Sorters.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Now available : Bulk Mass-Storage inserters and Mass Storage Power controllers.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Rapid Logistics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This ultimate tier of Mass Storage will let us utilise large amounts of power to transfer thousands of items to and from our mass storage systems.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Now available : Mass Storage IO ports. IO Ports can be used exactly like Storage Hoppers and interact with Mass Storage Crates.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Room Building
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Quite frankly we can't just leave everything lying around outside. If we develop basic room-building technology, we can perhaps start to create less of a shanty town and more of an organised fortress.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now build Airlocks, Room Controllers and Room Grommets.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Advanced Room Building
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Rooms are useful, and it's nice to no longer get rained on, but we can research new tech to allow us to give rooms specific purposes, enhancing the efficiency of our base.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now build Base Scanners, allowing us to monitor our logistics base.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Clean Room Building
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Rooms are useful, and it's nice to no longer get rained on, but we can research new tech to allow us to give rooms specific purposes, enhancing the efficiency of our base.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now build Extractors and Filters, allowing us to make Clean Rooms.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Agriculture
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Right. These plants. They've gotta go. Maybe we can do something useful with them?
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now build Hydroponic Bays, HerbiCors and Ampule Crafters, for on-the-spot healing.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Room Aesthetics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: These rooms are ugly. We need substantially more variety in our rooms! All the items within this research require the Dapper DLC to use, as they are only cosmetic.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now build a variety of pointless yet lovely new Room-based items.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Improved Cargo Lifts
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Whilst Cargo Lifts are exceptionally useful for bulk movement of items from deep underground, we need to make them better. Researching this should give us access to Improved Cargo Lifts!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Improved Cargo Lifts now available!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Bulk Cargo Lifts
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We now need access to much bigger and faster Cargo Lifts, as well as upgraded Robotic Sorters.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Bulk Cargo Lifts and Robotic Sorters now available!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Metal Alloys
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Using local metals it should be possible to create higher grade steel for improved equipment quality.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: By combining Iron and Nickel, we can create a low-grade steel. Perhaps with future ores we can create even better alloys.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Freight Transit
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We'll need a way to distribute components to additional manufacturing lines. With a simplistic AI it would be possible to construct a simple cart system to move goods autonomously to where they are needed.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: At the moment we only have scrap material to work with so we can't move very much at a time nor very quickly but at least we won't need to do the heavy lifting by hand.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Rolling Stock
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Now we have access to better materials, we can create automation capable of moving large amounts of resources.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now research the basic components to an automated, rail-based mass-transit system!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Improved Minecarts
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: As our base expands, we need specific vehicles for specific tasks. This will allow faster or bigger Minecarts to be made!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: You can now make Fast Minecarts and Large Minecarts!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Improved Minecart Logistics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: The current Minecarts are difficult to control in larger Logstics operations. Researching this will give us access to decision-making track pieces.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: You can now make Buffers, Full Gates and Empty Gates!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Crystal Dynamics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: The crystals you found underground seem to have strange properties. Studying them may open new possibilities.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: These crystals seem to be made of a crystalline form of quartz with extremely high electrical conductance.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Advanced Crystal Dynamics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: There are more options available for the Crystalline Ores we have been using.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: With the appropriate addition of energy, we should be able to create very high frequency clock crystals.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Hydrocarbon Recombination
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Organic life appears to be quite abundant in the deep hostile caverns. Perhaps you can make use of them.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: By integrating the local crystals into refinery schematics from the ship database you can break down and recombine the hydrocarbons found in primitive growths from the deep caverns. This should allow production of new materials for more complex machinery.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Orbital Power Transmission
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This will allow us to transmit power into orbit. Perhaps we can beam the power back down afterwards. That's the only way to be sure.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: The Orbital Power Transmitter should allow us to bounce stored energy off of a satellite, and remove the Overminds controlling these surface attacks.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Orbital Railgun
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Hey, let's put a GPS satellite in orbit. How hard can it be?
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: It turns out that it'll be really REALLY hard to do this. We choose to do this, not because is it easy, but because it is hard.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Basic Rocketry
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: If we can master a more potent fuel source, we should be able to create simple rockets to complete tasks for us.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We now have access to Fuel Compressors, that will make us High Octane Fuel!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Basic Robotics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This will allow access to basic Robotics Control modules, and Coppator robotics parts.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now start to BUILD THE ROBOTS

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Simple Robotics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This will allow access to Tindron robotics parts.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now start to BUILD THE ROBOTS

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Intermediate Robotics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This will allow access to Bronzite robotics parts.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now start to BUILD THE ROBOTS

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Complex Robotics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This will allow access to Ironide robotics parts.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now start to BUILD THE ROBOTS

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Advanced Defence
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We need to build more powerful base defenses to take down the bigger threats.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We have successfully designed a missile turret and made further improvements to the energy turret. We will need to manufacture missiles and this will require a supply of fuel.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Advanced Energy Defence
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: If we need a more powerful energy-based weapon, then this is the ideal place to find it.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We've finished the design of a multiblock turret, requiring huge energy, but capable of destroying the largest of enemy mobs.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Missile Defence
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: These Basic Missiles aren't cutting it. We're going to need to improve them.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Now we can craft Armour Piercing Warheads, and if we have the power, further Imbue them with Plasma Energy.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Aesthetics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: In the unlikely event we have some down time we can prettify our base with a variety of coloured storage crates and canvas.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: In the unlikely event we have some down time we can prettify our base with a variety of coloured storage crates and canvas.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Large Scale Vein Extraction
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: The ore extractors we have been using so far do not appear to be up to the task of mining the new ores we've found down below. We'll have to develop new ways of extraction. A small sample of the new ores from the Hard Rock Grinder and using up the last of the old Research Pods should see us clear!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: The ore extractor we've developed is much bigger than old ones, allowing it to apply much more force on the ore material. It also appears to be much more efficient at gathering the softer ores.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Efficient Vein Extraction
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: A more efficient Drill Head will allow us to use more of the ore we collect.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Perfect Vein Extraction
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: This third tier of Drill Head will allow us to extract 100% of known ores with no wastage.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Frozen Factory Expansion
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: With the Nova growing ever-larger, we need to see about relocating ourselves to somewhere less inhospitable. The methane-filled 'Cold Caverns' should provide us with cover, if we are able to terraform them. Researching this will give us the information we need! NOTE : ALL MACHINES UNLOCKED BY THIS RESEARCH WILL REQUIRE THE FROZEN FACTORY EXPANSION PACK TO BE INSTALLED!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now build a Cold Cavern Climate Control Centre! (Also known as the CCCCC or the C5!)

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Basic CryoPlasm Defence
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Our attempt to warm up the Cold Caverns and make them a hospitable place to live has backfired! We appear to have activated an unknown number of previously deep-frozen organic spores. These are now growing and consuming everything in their path. They're a non-newtonian liquid, so bombs are exceptionally ineffective against them! We need to research new forms of defence immediately!
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now craft the CryoPlasm Lancer. This should allow us to hold off small amounts of CryoPlasm at short range. It's likely we'll need to go bigger soon though!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: CryoPlasm Defence Scanning
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: The Cryo is... everywhere? That can't be. We need to organise our defences.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: You should probably build that right away.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Long Range CryoPlasm Defence
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Our Lancers are going to get overwhelmed, and we need to defend the base from further afield. Researching this will allow us access to much larger and more destructive weaponry.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Please deploy your Dazzler Turrets appropriately and safely.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Static CryoPlasm Defence
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: If the CryoPlasm touches our machines, they simply stop working. We need to ensure that our base is defended against surges of CryoPlasm. Researching this will give us access to static defences.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: CryoMines will not detonate if you stand on them, but it is recommended you avoid the corrosive cloud.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Mobile CryoPlasm Defence
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We need both close and long-range defences if we are going to survive. Researching this will allow us to retrofit FALCOR drones with electrically-charged explosive devices.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: For the Cold Caverns! FOR FREEDOM!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Improved CryoPlasm Defence
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: With some work, we should be able to use Freezon gas to supercharge our existing defence network. This technology should also used to massively improve our existing Resin handling system.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: For the Cold Caverns! FOR FREEDOM!

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Particulate Filtration
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: The continued use of the unusual biomes underground have indicated that the atmosphere contains useful amounts of trace particles, which can extract.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We can now craft the Particulate Filter. This will allow us to capture particles out of the air over time.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: MagmaBore
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We can't continue to fight against the CryoPlasm forever; the Magma Caves we located deep below could be used as a source of heat to permenantly render the caverns ours.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: That's... that's a big drill.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: 8 lights in the dark
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We feel that these final sets of machines will be suitable for defeating the CryoPlasm.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: We now have access to the CryoPlasm Inferno. This should let us burn the spawners to a crisp. We've also perfected over-charging certain machines using the Freezon Injector; combine those with the CyroPlasm Lancers and we should see a substantial boost in performance.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Spooky Aesthetics
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: In glorious tradition, we should consider decorating our base for the forthcoming celebration.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Doot doot.

ResearchDataEntry.Name: Mothballed
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: Some machine have become less useful as FortressCraft has progressed. I've popped all those machines behind this research, as I can't remove them for reasons of Mods and Compatibility. No point in researching this unless you're looking for something that went missing. All machines under this category should be considered 'unsupported'.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: Doot doot.
